hanzi-su-wiki:
型

Значения

Тип, модель, форма, стиль

Мнемоника

Земляная 土 литейная форма. Землю в ней трамбуют 幵, лишнее — подчищают ножом 刂. Форма, модель.

heisig_chinese_memo: After being punished with a beating the criminal was face down on the ground leaving a mold of his position after the police came to get him. &nbsp
heisig_constituent: mould, punish, two hands, sword, sabre, saber, soil, dirt, ground
heisig_story: Punish . . . soil. In cases like this, you might find it easier to break the character up into its more basic elements, like this: two hands . . . saber . . . soil.
koohiiStory1: A famous ninja once pressed his two hands and saber into the soil of his temple, before going onto a mission from which he never came back. Think of some sort of signature that he left behind him. The mould of his two hands and saber has since become a popular attraction in the area.
koohiiStory2: As a PUNISHMENT they made me lay face down in the DIRT leaving a nice imprinted MOULD of my whole BODY.
jp_example_words:
模型(もけい): model, dummy, maquette
型(かた): mold, model, style, shape, data type
典型(てんけい): type, pattern, archetypal
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: There is a lantern on top of a knife in the dirt. You walk up to take the knife and lantern when you realize it's just a model. It all looked real from far away, but now that you're up close you can see none of it is real.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Why would anyone make a model that looks like a lantern and a knife sticking into the ground?
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: You touch the model and see that it's made of cake (けい)! Someone really into lanterns and knives must have been given this model cake as a birthday present! Though they left it out here so they probably didn't like it.
WaniKani_Reading_Info: Haven't you seen any of those crazy cakes modeled after things like movies, towns, giants hams, and purses? They're all the rage. Next time you make a cake try to make it look like a model lantern and knife with fake cake dirt and everything.

chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: After being punished with a beating the criminal was face down on the ground leaving a mold of his position after the police came to get him. &nbsp
humanum_full_description_en:
Bronze inscription from "㓝" from " earth ", "㓝" or from " blade ". "㓝" and " punishment " with, is " type " of sound character. Both "㓝" and " type " come from the sound of the " well ". In ancient times, the fences around the well are staggered and orderly, so "㓝" and " type " take the meaning of order and law from the " well ". The original meaning is law and criterion. The " type " variant is from the " dog ".

Bronze " type " read as " punishment " indicates testimonies, guidelines, Zhongshan Wang Ding: "test house (degrees) short-tailed bird (but) type" investigation measure means things are guidelines to follow (Zhang Shi-chao). It also expresses the penalty, Zhongshan Wang Yuanhu: "Big go type (penal) punishment."

The Chu bamboo slips of the Warring States period are " type " or written as "坓", without the " knife ". Chu Jane " type " is also read as " punishment ", "Bo on the bamboo slips V. Ji Kangzi asked about Confucius: "A good type (Xing) is not a sheep (Auspicious)." See " Xing ".

"Said Wen": "Type, the method of casting. Sound from the earth."
humanum_short_description_en: Bronze inscription from "㓝" from " earth ", "㓝" or from " blade ". "㓝" and " punishment " with, is " type " of sound character. Both "㓝" and " type " come from the sound of the " well ". In ancient times, the fences around the well are staggered and orderly, so "㓝" and " type " take the meaning of order and law from the " well ". The original meaning is law and criterion.
humanum_full_description:
金文從「㓝」從「土」，「㓝」或從「刃」。「㓝」與「刑」同，是「型」的聲符。「㓝」、「型」皆從「井」聲，古代井邊圍欄交錯有序，故「㓝」、「型」從「井」取其有秩序、法度之意。本義是法度、準則。「型」的異體從「犬」。

　　金文「型」通讀作「刑」，表示法度、準則，中山王鼎：「考宅(度)隹(惟)型」，意指考察量度事物均有準則可循(張世超)。又表示刑罰，中山王圓壺：「大去型(刑)罰」。

　　戰國楚簡「型」或寫作「坓」，無「刀」旁。楚簡「型」亦通讀作「刑」，《上博楚竹書五．季康子問於孔子》：「好型(刑)則不羊(祥)」。參見「刑」。

　　《說文》：「型，鑄器之法也。从土𠛬聲。」
humanum_short_description: 金文從「㓝」從「土」，「㓝」或從「刃」。「㓝」與「刑」同，是「型」的聲符。「㓝」、「型」皆從「井」聲，古代井邊圍欄交錯有序，故「㓝」、「型」從「井」取其有秩序、法度之意。本義是法度、準則。

金文從「 㓝 」從「 土 」，「 㓝 」或從「 刃 」。「 㓝 」與「 刑 」同，是「 型 」的聲符。「 㓝 」、「 型 」皆從「 井 」聲，古代井邊圍欄交錯有序，故「 㓝 」、「 型 」從「 井 」取其有秩序、法度之意。本義是法度、準則。「 型 」的異體從「 犬 」。 金文「 型 」通讀作「 刑 」，表示法度、準則，中山王鼎：「考宅(度)隹(惟)型」，意指考察量度事物均有準則可循(張世超)。又表示刑罰，中山王圓壺：「大去型(刑)罰」。 戰國楚簡「 型 」或寫作「 坓 」，無「 刀 」旁。楚簡「 型 」亦通讀作「 刑 」，《上博楚竹書五．季康子問於孔子》：「好型(刑)則不羊(祥)」。參見「 刑 」。 《說文》：「型，鑄器之法也。从土𠛬聲。」
Bronze inscription from " 㓝" from " earth", " 㓝" or from " blade". " 㓝" and " punishment" with, is " type" of sound character. Both" 㓝" and " type" come from the sound of the " well". In ancient times, the fences around the well are staggered and orderly, so " 㓝" and " type" take the meaning of order and law from the " well". The original meaning is law and criterion. The " type" variant is from the " dog". Bronze " type" read as " punishment" indicates testimonies, guidelines, Zhongshan Wang Ding: "test house (degrees) short-tailed bird (but) type" investigation measure means things are guidelines to follow (Zhang Shi-chao). It also expresses the penalty, Zhongshan Wang Yuanhu: "Big go type (penal) punishment." The Chu bamboo slips of the Warring States period are " type" or written as " 坓", without the " knife". Chu Jane " type" is also read as " punishment", "Bo on the bamboo slips V. Ji Kangzi asked about Confucius: "A good type (Xing) is not a sheep (Auspicious)." See " Xing". "Said Wen": "Type, the method of casting. Sound from the earth."

型字的基本解释

型
xíng
铸造器物用的模子：砂型。型砂（制造砂型的材料）。
样式：类型。新型。型号。脸型。血型。

型字的汉语字典释义

[①]［xíng］
［《廣韻》户經切，平青，匣。］
“坓2”的今字。
(1)浇铸器物用的模子。
(2)引申为法式，楷模。
(3)类型；样式。

型字的英文翻译

◎ 型
model, mould, type

型字的康熙字典解释

【丑集中】【土字部】　型； 康熙笔画：9； 页码：页227第28
〔古文〕坓【廣韻】戸經切【集韻】【韻會】乎經切【正韻】奚經切，?音?。模也。凡鑄式，以土曰型，木曰模，金曰範。　本作型。型字从?作。

型字的源字形

型字的起名意思

：铸造器物用的模子；式样，类别。

Пиктофонетические символы.
Значение «почва» означает, что форма сделана из почвы, звук «Син» означает, что предложение означает разделение, что означает, что форма должна быть открыта, когда нужно вынуть посуду.
Первоначальное значение - плесень.

писец
xíng
1) шаблон, трафарет; сделанный по шаблону
2) тип, образец; фасон, форма, стиль
新型拖拉机 трактор нового типа (образца)
小型汽车 малолитражный автомобиль
型材 профиль
3) земляная форма (для литья); формовой; литой
金属型 металлическая форма
Radicals: 开, 刂, 土  (lantern, knife, dirt)
Meaning Mnemonic
There is a lantern on top of a knife in the dirt. You walk up to take the knife and lantern when you realize it's just a model. It all looked real from far away, but now that you're up close you can see none of it is real.
Why would anyone make a model that looks like a lantern and a knife sticking into the ground?
Reading Mnemonic
You touch the model and see that it's made of cake (けい)! Someone really into lanterns and knives must have been given this model cake as a birthday present! Though they left it out here so they probably didn't like it.
Haven't you seen any of those crazy cakes modeled after things like movies, towns, giants hams, and purses? They're all the rage. Next time you make a cake try to make it look like a model lantern and knife with fake cake dirt and everything.
